fontTheory.description: The typography system is designed to balance professionalism and readability, catering to the formal nature of a resume while ensuring clear communication.
fontTheory.readability: The chosen fonts prioritize legibility, with serif and sans-serif options for easy reading across various screen sizes.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The hierarchy is established through font sizes, weights, and styles. Headings are bold and larger for emphasis, while body text is regular for clarity.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Arial for headings and functional elements create a modern and clean look, while Georgia for body text adds a touch of sophistication and traditional appeal. The monospaced Courier New ensures code and technical content stand out distinctly.
